name: E.R.O.S
description:
E.R.O.S is a unique interactive fiction story made in the spinoff app about the human connection in relationships and how that affects the outside world.

The story follows E.R.O.S an Emotional robotic operating system robot who has spent years being a therapist to the citizens of the city of Bayonne. After a firmware upgrade called CUPID E.R.O.S will now be assisting people in a new way… matchmaking!

What will you and E.R.O.S learn about the romantic connection between two beings? Will it end sweetly or hurt badly?

Help your friendly neighborhood robot do its job, for better or for worse because all is fair in love and war.

GAME INCLUDES:

      - Point & Click style interface

      - Choices & Branching system

-----------------------------------------------------------

An interesting story in a deeply built universe. Reminding us of the fundamentals of love, so we can share a little more of it. 

Created for the Interactive Story Jam #2 in 30 days!

Anjali Kai - Creator, Writer and Developer

Commissioned music by Kayupla for an original soundtrack!

Dev Note: I would love to continue the story and actually make it a full-blown game with different plot lines and locations! Please let me know if this is something you would be interested in seeing/or playing!
